item.title: Learning window functions with postgresql
item.description: Objective Learn what window functions are and how they are used. This example uses the fake messaging app playgroung. What we are going to do is to get the messages from groups a user is part of, only the top 3 messages of each group sorted by creation date are returned. This blog is written using commit cf971929380a91730dffb9b87177f664bd87aa1a of the fake messaging app playground. An example use case What we are going to do is to obtain the latest 3 messages a user has from each group.
